speaker: DUKE
text_entry: SCENE II. Rousillon. The COUNT's palace.

speaker: DUKE
text_entry: Enter COUNTESS and Clown

speaker: COUNTESS
text_entry: It hath happened all as I would have had it, save

speaker: COUNTESS
text_entry: that he comes not along with her.

speaker: Clown
text_entry: By my troth, I take my young lord to be a very

speaker: Clown
text_entry: melancholy man.

speaker: COUNTESS
text_entry: By what observance, I pray you?

speaker: Clown
text_entry: Why, he will look upon his boot and sing; mend the

speaker: Clown
text_entry: ruff and sing; ask questions and sing; pick his

speaker: Clown
text_entry: teeth and sing. I know a man that had this trick of

speaker: Clown
text_entry: melancholy sold a goodly manor for a song.

speaker: COUNTESS
text_entry: Let me see what he writes, and when he means to come.

speaker: COUNTESS
text_entry: Opening a letter

speaker: Clown
text_entry: I have no mind to Isbel since I was at court: our

speaker: Clown
text_entry: old ling and our Isbels o' the country are nothing

speaker: Clown
text_entry: like your old ling and your Isbels o' the court:

speaker: Clown
text_entry: the brains of my Cupid's knocked out, and I begin to

speaker: Clown
text_entry: love, as an old man loves money, with no stomach.

speaker: COUNTESS
text_entry: What have we here?

speaker: Clown
text_entry: E'en that you have there.

speaker: Clown
text_entry: Exit

speaker: COUNTESS
text_entry: [Reads]  I have sent you a daughter-in-law: she hath

speaker: COUNTESS
text_entry: recovered the king, and undone me. I have wedded

speaker: COUNTESS
text_entry: her, not bedded her; and sworn to make the 'not'

speaker: COUNTESS
text_entry: eternal. You shall hear I am run away: know it

speaker: COUNTESS
text_entry: before the report come. If there be breadth enough

speaker: COUNTESS
text_entry: in the world, I will hold a long distance. My duty

speaker: COUNTESS
text_entry: to you. Your unfortunate son,

speaker: COUNTESS
text_entry: BERTRAM.

speaker: COUNTESS
text_entry: This is not well, rash and unbridled boy.

speaker: COUNTESS
text_entry: To fly the favours of so good a king;

speaker: COUNTESS
text_entry: To pluck his indignation on thy head

speaker: COUNTESS
text_entry: By the misprising of a maid too virtuous

speaker: COUNTESS
text_entry: For the contempt of empire.

speaker: COUNTESS
text_entry: Re-enter Clown

speaker: Clown
text_entry: O madam, yonder is heavy news within between two

speaker: Clown
text_entry: soldiers and my young lady!

speaker: COUNTESS
text_entry: What is the matter?

speaker: Clown
text_entry: Nay, there is some comfort in the news, some

speaker: Clown
text_entry: comfort; your son will not be killed so soon as I

speaker: Clown
text_entry: thought he would.

speaker: COUNTESS
text_entry: Why should he be killed?

speaker: Clown
text_entry: So say I, madam, if he run away, as I hear he does:

speaker: Clown
text_entry: the danger is in standing to't; that's the loss of

speaker: Clown
text_entry: men, though it be the getting of children. Here

speaker: Clown
text_entry: they come will tell you more: for my part, I only

speaker: Clown
text_entry: hear your son was run away.

speaker: Clown
text_entry: Exit

speaker: Clown
text_entry: Enter HELENA, and two Gentlemen

speaker: First Gentleman
text_entry: Save you, good madam.

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: Madam, my lord is gone, for ever gone.

speaker: Second Gentleman
text_entry: Do not say so.

speaker: COUNTESS
text_entry: Think upon patience. Pray you, gentlemen,

speaker: COUNTESS
text_entry: I have felt so many quirks of joy and grief,

speaker: COUNTESS
text_entry: That the first face of neither, on the start,

speaker: COUNTESS
text_entry: Can woman me unto't: where is my son, I pray you?

speaker: Second Gentleman
text_entry: Madam, he's gone to serve the duke of Florence:

speaker: Second Gentleman
text_entry: We met him thitherward; for thence we came,

speaker: Second Gentleman
text_entry: And, after some dispatch in hand at court,

speaker: Second Gentleman
text_entry: Thither we bend again.

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: Look on his letter, madam; here's my passport.

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: Reads

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: When thou canst get the ring upon my finger which

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: never shall come off, and show me a child begotten

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: of thy body that I am father to, then call me

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: husband: but in such a 'then' I write a 'never.'

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: This is a dreadful sentence.

speaker: COUNTESS
text_entry: Brought you this letter, gentlemen?

speaker: First Gentleman
text_entry: Ay, madam;

speaker: First Gentleman
text_entry: And for the contents' sake are sorry for our pain.

speaker: COUNTESS
text_entry: I prithee, lady, have a better cheer;

speaker: COUNTESS
text_entry: If thou engrossest all the griefs are thine,

speaker: COUNTESS
text_entry: Thou robb'st me of a moiety: he was my son;

speaker: COUNTESS
text_entry: But I do wash his name out of my blood,

speaker: COUNTESS
text_entry: And thou art all my child. Towards Florence is he?

speaker: Second Gentleman
text_entry: Ay, madam.

speaker: COUNTESS
text_entry: And to be a soldier?

speaker: Second Gentleman
text_entry: Such is his noble purpose; and believe 't,

speaker: Second Gentleman
text_entry: The duke will lay upon him all the honour

speaker: Second Gentleman
text_entry: That good convenience claims.

speaker: COUNTESS
text_entry: Return you thither?

speaker: First Gentleman
text_entry: Ay, madam, with the swiftest wing of speed.

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: [Reads]  Till I have no wife I have nothing in France.

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: 'Tis bitter.

speaker: COUNTESS
text_entry: Find you that there?

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: Ay, madam.

speaker: First Gentleman
text_entry: 'Tis but the boldness of his hand, haply, which his

speaker: First Gentleman
text_entry: heart was not consenting to.

speaker: COUNTESS
text_entry: Nothing in France, until he have no wife!

speaker: COUNTESS
text_entry: There's nothing here that is too good for him

speaker: COUNTESS
text_entry: But only she; and she deserves a lord

speaker: COUNTESS
text_entry: That twenty such rude boys might tend upon

speaker: COUNTESS
text_entry: And call her hourly mistress. Who was with him?

speaker: First Gentleman
text_entry: A servant only, and a gentleman

speaker: First Gentleman
text_entry: Which I have sometime known.

speaker: COUNTESS
text_entry: Parolles, was it not?

speaker: First Gentleman
text_entry: Ay, my good lady, he.

speaker: COUNTESS
text_entry: A very tainted fellow, and full of wickedness.

speaker: COUNTESS
text_entry: My son corrupts a well-derived nature

speaker: COUNTESS
text_entry: With his inducement.

speaker: First Gentleman
text_entry: Indeed, good lady,

speaker: First Gentleman
text_entry: The fellow has a deal of that too much,

speaker: First Gentleman
text_entry: Which holds him much to have.

speaker: COUNTESS
text_entry: You're welcome, gentlemen.

speaker: COUNTESS
text_entry: I will entreat you, when you see my son,

speaker: COUNTESS
text_entry: To tell him that his sword can never win

speaker: COUNTESS
text_entry: The honour that he loses: more I'll entreat you

speaker: COUNTESS
text_entry: Written to bear along.

speaker: Second Gentleman
text_entry: We serve you, madam,

speaker: Second Gentleman
text_entry: In that and all your worthiest affairs.

speaker: COUNTESS
text_entry: Not so, but as we change our courtesies.

speaker: COUNTESS
text_entry: Will you draw near!

speaker: COUNTESS
text_entry: Exeunt COUNTESS and Gentlemen

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: 'Till I have no wife, I have nothing in France.'

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: Nothing in France, until he has no wife!

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: Thou shalt have none, Rousillon, none in France;

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: Then hast thou all again. Poor lord! is't I

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: That chase thee from thy country and expose

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: Those tender limbs of thine to the event

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: Of the none-sparing war? and is it I

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: That drive thee from the sportive court, where thou

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: Wast shot at with fair eyes, to be the mark

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: Of smoky muskets? O you leaden messengers,

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: That ride upon the violent speed of fire,

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: Fly with false aim; move the still-peering air,

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: That sings with piercing; do not touch my lord.

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: Whoever shoots at him, I set him there;

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: Whoever charges on his forward breast,

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: I am the caitiff that do hold him to't;

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: And, though I kill him not, I am the cause

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: His death was so effected: better 'twere

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: I met the ravin lion when he roar'd

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: With sharp constraint of hunger; better 'twere

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: That all the miseries which nature owes

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: Were mine at once. No, come thou home, Rousillon,

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: Whence honour but of danger wins a scar,

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: As oft it loses all: I will be gone;

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: My being here it is that holds thee hence:

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: Shall I stay here to do't?  no, no, although

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: The air of paradise did fan the house

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: And angels officed all: I will be gone,

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: That pitiful rumour may report my flight,

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: To consolate thine ear. Come, night; end, day!

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: For with the dark, poor thief, I'll steal away.

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: Exit
